author: NylaPop
name: ActivityCredits
short: Award currency credits to active members.
description: Give currency to members per message.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store end user data.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the cog. I'm in the Cog Support server if you need help with anything. Make sure you take a look under `[p]activitycredits` before getting started, the settings are all set to 0 by default
